t: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: Kozlowski Farms Jam, Three Berry, 10-Ounce (Pack of 6)
s: This jam reminds me of the national Knotts Berry Farm (I can not remember which Argri business owns the brand) version of the jam...overly sweet, with none of the tang I am am seeking in a great boysenberry jam. I bought 6 jars, and will use them, but will not be back...the journey continues. ... I have used Kozlowski ...
